name: Give Me a Pound My Friend
name_original: Give Me a Pound My Friend
description:
[ENG]

Game was created for fun and relax while working on Cave of Duty during Ludum Dare 40. Base on this simple game we introduced our friend to secrets of game programming using Unity3D engine.

[PL]

Gra powstała na Ludum Dare 40 dla rozluźnienia się w trakcie pracy nad Cave of Duty. Na podstawie tej prostej gry wprowadzaliśmy naszego znajomego w tajniki programowania gier na silniku Unity3D.
